1294870.name: A Place for the Unwilling - Digital Artbook
1294870.description:
What is the allure of a city, the spell that makes you think of its streets, squares, alleys and façades? Is it the strangeness of its people, their particular quirks and mannerisms that make them different from any other people in the world? [...]

Get all the insights of the development of A Place for the Unwilling with this Digital Artbook featuring images of the whole process, from the pixel art prototype and the hand-drawn sketches to the final game artwork. Get to know the characters and the darkest alleys of The City, accompanied by the descriptions and commentary of Rubén Calles (Art Director) and Ángel Luis Sucasas (Narrative Designer).

A hundred pages of exclusive content to help you unveiling the mysteries that lie in this foggy city.
